changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Track every improvement, feature, and fix we ship to make FairArena better for you.

stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated
stayUpdated.text: Follow our journey as we continue to build the best hackathon platform in the world.

changes.description: Added Enterprise SSO with domain verification and SAML 2.0 support for organizations
Implemented OAuth 2.0 Device Authorization Flow for CLI and IoT devices
Added support for multiple OAuth providers: GitHub, Google, Atlassian, Figma, Vercel, and Zoom
Enhanced CSRF protection with dedicated token endpoint and automatic refresh
Migrated to TanStack DB for sub-millisecond reactive updates in Inbox
Fixed authentication token refresh causing unexpected logouts
Implemented OAuth 2.0 Device Authorization Flow for headless devices
Added Atlassian OAuth integration with environment configuration
Updated frontend sign-in/sign-up pages to display all OAuth providers
Fixed "Unknown Application" error on device consent page
Resolved authentication issues with /device/verify endpoint
Applied database migrations with Prisma for schema updates
Added team invitation system with email notifications
Enhanced backend server restart handling after configuration changes
Fixed authentication flow with proper token refresh and session invalidation
Refactored MCP server to use HTTP/SSE transport instead of stdio
Added production-ready Dockerfile for containerized deployment
Implemented rate limiting, CORS, and authentication for MCP server
Secured Pinecone credentials server-side with client-provided Gemini API keys
Created comprehensive README.md and mcp-config.example.json
Fixed TypeScript errors in production feature implementation
Integrated Pinecone vector database for AI-powered documentation search
Added search_documentation tool with embedding-based retrieval
Moved AI system prompt to separate file for better maintainability
Fixed Pinecone dimension mismatch by using 384-dimensional embeddings
Resolved sharp module installation error for @xenova/transformers
Launched OAuth authorization endpoint with consent flow
Added OAuth application management dashboard
Fixed 404 error for /oauth/authorize endpoint
Added SECURITY notification type for security-related alerts
Redesigned feedback and unsubscribe pages with minimal blackish theme using Shadcn UI
Fixed upstream image response timeout errors during development
Resolved Docker build failures with pnpm installation
Added real-time GitHub repository stats display in sidebar and footer
Implemented Redis caching with 6-hour TTL for GitHub data
Added TanStack Query with 2-hour staleTime for optimized data fetching
Enhanced authentication state caching after login and MFA verification
Fixed infinite loop in Axios interceptor when token refresh fails

list: “Company” (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Cookies Policy) refers to FairArena.
“Cookies” means small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
“Website” refers to FairArena, accessible from fair.sakshamg.me
“You” means the individual accessing or using the Website, or a company, or any legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Website, as applicable.

usage.title: 2. The Use of the Cookies
usage.subtitle: 2.1 Type of Cookies We Use
usage.content1: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close your web browser.
usage.content2: We use both session and persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:

essential.title: Necessary / Essential Cookies
essential.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.

tracking.title: Tracking and Performance Cookies
tracking.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are used to track information about traffic to the Website and how users use the Website. The information gathered via these Cookies may directly or indirectly identify you as an individual visitor. This is because the information collected is typically linked to a pseudonymous identifier associated with the device you use to access the Website. We may also use these Cookies to test new advertisements, pages, features or new functionality of the Website to see how our users react to them.

choices.title: 3. Your Choices Regarding Cookies
choices.content1: If You prefer to avoid the use of Cookies on the Website, first You must disable the use of Cookies in your browser and then delete the Cookies saved in your browser associated with this website. You may use this option for preventing the use of Cookies at any time.
choices.content2: If You do not accept Our Cookies, You may experience some inconvenience in your use of the Website and some features may not function properly.
choices.content3: For more information on how to manage and delete Cookies, visit the official support documents for your specific web browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge, etc.).

moreInfo.title: 4. More Information about Cookies
moreInfo.content: You can learn more about cookies: What Are Cookies?.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: FairArena respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects our users to do the same. In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (DMCA), we will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement committed using our service.

notification.title: Filing a DMCA Notice
notification.text: If you believe that content on FairArena infringes your copyright, please provide our Copyright Agent with the following information:
list: A physical or electronic signature of the copyright owner or person authorized to act on their behalf
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed
Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing, with sufficient detail to locate it on our service
Your contact information (address, telephone number, and email address)
A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material is not authorized by the copyright owner
A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner

counter.title: Counter-Notification
counter.text: If you believe that your content was removed by mistake or misidentification, you may file a counter-notification with our Copyright Agent. The counter-notification must include:
list: Your physical or electronic signature
Identification of the material that has been removed and its location before removal
A statement under penalty of perjury that you have a good faith belief the material was removed by mistake
Your name, address, and telephone number
A statement that you consent to the jurisdiction of the federal court in your district

repeat.title: Repeat Infringers
repeat.text: FairArena will terminate the accounts of users who are determined to be repeat infringers. We reserve the right to decide whether content violates our policies for reasons other than copyright infringement.
